comprehensive_overview: OpenHPC is a collaborative, community-driven effort to provide a comprehensive and cohesive open-source HPC stack to the community. Through close collaboration with key stakeholders across the industry, OpenHPC aims to provide a reference collection of open-source HPC software components and best practices to enable the development, testing, and deployment of HPC systems. Ultimately, building on the resecarch outputs from various related fields.
core_features: Comprehensive collection of open-source HPC software components
Best practices for HPC system development, testing, and deployment
Collaboration with key stakeholders in the industry
